/usr/bin/c++     CMakeFiles/clientTest.dir/src/chat_client.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clientTest.dir/src/chat_message.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clientTest.dir/src/chat_room.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clientTest.dir/src/chat_session.cpp.o  -o clientTest -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/boost/lib /usr/local/boost/lib/libboost_system.so.1.88.0 -lpthread
